title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.23 - Specifications of games of chance equipment and supplies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.23 - Specifications of games of chance equipment and supplies

State Regulations

All equipment and supplies designed for, manufactured, sold or leased for use in the conduct of games of chance shall be restricted to
those games authorized by the commission and in accordance with the
specifications and rules for such games promulgated by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4607.23

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
